author: PlayStation
description:
Wishlist Now 👉 https://store.playstation.com/concept/10014711/

Step into the paws of a nimble ninja cat! Dash through enemies, deflect bullets, and master the katana in fast, fun VR combat.

Between battles, unwind in your cozy garden—sharpen your blade, play with Grandpa Kenji, or just be a silly cat. 

#ps5 #psvr2 #psvr2games
title: Сatana: Red Flowers - Announcement Trailer | PS VR2 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
Step into the unknown.

Uncover the secrets of Kepler and confront the cosmic force pulling the threads of your destiny.

The Nine are calling. Will you answer?

FOLLOW DESTINY:
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/DestinyTheGame
Twitter: https://www.twitter.com/destinythegame
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/destinythegame
Discord: http://www.discord.gg/destinygame

FOLLOW BUNGIE:
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Bungie/
Twitter: https://www.twitter.com/bungie
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/bungie/
⠀ ⠀ ⠀ ⠀
Dive into the free-to-play world of Destiny 2 to experience responsive first-person shooter combat, explore the mysteries of our solar system, and unleash elemental abilities against powerful enemies. Create your Guardian and collect unique weapons, armor, and gear to customize your look and playstyle. Experience Destiny 2’s cinematic story alone or with friends, join other Guardians for challenging co-op missions, or compete against them in a variety of PvP modes.

#ps5
title: Destiny 2 - The Edge of Fate Cinematic Trailer | PS5, PS4 & PC Games

author: PlayStation
description:
The Nine extend an invitation.     

Rite of the Nine begins today, available for all players. Prove your skill in three dungeons across three unique modes of play to earn unique rewards. Learn the ropes solo or with friends in the matchmaking-enabled Explorer mode. Ramp up the challenge in Eternity mode. Dare to demonstrate your mastery in Ultimatum mode.

Captain Blood is a pirate-themed action game where you play as a fearsome pirate seeking gold and glory. The game has finally ‘made port’ after two decades and is available now for PlayStation 4 and PlayStation 5.

author: PlayStation
description:
https://www.playstation.com/games/neverwinter/

Neverwinter's Red Harvest module, is now available! Explore a brand-new Adventure Zone featuring a striking map inspired by the depiction of Thay featured in the critically acclaimed Dungeons & Dragons movie, Dungeons & Dragons: Honor Among Thieves. Szass Tam, the powerful lich, rules over Thay with cruelty alongside his Zulkir council. To prevent further threats to the realm, Sergeant Knox calls upon adventurers to put an end to Szass Tam and the Red Wizards' tyranny before it's too late. In addition to a new Adventure Zone, this module introduces the “Shackles of Divinity” trial that features an epic boss battle!

#ps4 #ps4games #neverwinter
title: Neverwinter - Red Harvest Launch Trailer | PS4 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://store.playstation.com/en-us/concept/10008153

Two new characters are now available for FREE in the beloved beat ‘em up Double Dragon Gaiden: Rise of the Dragons!

Today’s free DLC brings two new characters into the game, with an additional six new fighters to be added. With roguelite elements, every playthrough is a chance at new action. 

Purchase today on PlayStation 5!

#ps5 #ps5games #doubledragon
title: Double Dragon Gaiden: Rise of the Dragons - Free DLC Trailer | PS5 & PS4 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
Jason and Lucia have always known the deck is stacked against them. But when an easy score goes wrong, they find themselves on the darkest side of the sunniest place in America, in the middle of a criminal conspiracy stretching across the state of Leonida — forced to rely on each other more than ever if they want to make it out alive.

Explore Vice City and beyond at https://www.rockstargames.com/VI

- Song: Hot Together
- Artist: The Pointer Sisters
- Written by Sharon Robinson
- Published by Universal Music Corp. on behalf of itself, Buchu Music and Robinhill Music (ASCAP)
- Courtesy of RCA Records, a division of Sony Music Entertainment
 
#ps5 #ps5games #grandtheftauto6 #gta6 #gtavi
title: Grand Theft Auto VI - Trailer 2 | PS5 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://www.playstation.com/en-us/games/zombie-army-vr/

Zombie Army VR is available to PRE-ORDER NOW on PlayStation VR2 and coming May 22nd 2025!
Zombie Hitler has been defeated, but the zombie hordes are still at large, and Europe remains in the throes of war. Following the story of Zombie Army, you return to the field as one of the Deadhunters, an elite squad fighting to end the apocalypse!

Fight your way through undead hordes near the bombed-out city of Nuremberg to help Captain Hermann Wolff, the Deadhunter’s legendary leader, find his scattered family, and fight to free Europe from the zombie apocalypse.

As you navigate the full-length, story-driven campaign alone or with an ally, you will have access to an arsenal of authentic World War II weaponry including sniper rifles, submachine guns, pistols, and more. 

VR also brings a new level of immersion to the nail-biting action of the Zombie Army series, and you will need to get to grips with using your hands to aim your rifle,
title: Zombie Army VR - Features Trailer | PS VR2 Games
